entries.comment: op heel interne allen bekend als een raga van Jonathan Mayer, (en evtl een mela?)
Raga Kalaranjani, een creatie van de Indiase bansuri speler Hariprasad Chaurasia, (https://www.concertzender.nl/programma/orient-express-1277/)
A blend of Madhuvanti and Shivranjani (back of cd of Imrat Khan)
Some say its a combination of Hambir, Gour Sarang and Kedar (PARVSH_2)

Rag Yamani is a close relative of Hindustani music''s best-known raga, Yaman. Yamani uses the same notes as Yaman, all the shuddh svaras and tivra Ma. The main differene is that shuddh Ma is much more prominent in Yamani. Vilayat Khan explains that Tamani has 2 proncipal rasas. Shanta is brought to the fore through the use of tivra Ma, he says, while Shringara is evoked by shuddh Ma.
